TypeSignature.Value: public delegate object ServiceCreatorCallback(IServiceContainer container, Type serviceType);
.class public auto ansi sealed ServiceCreatorCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ServiceCreatorCallback(container As IServiceContainer, serviceType As Type) As Object
public delegate System::Object ^ ServiceCreatorCallback(IServiceContainer ^ container, Type ^ serviceType);
type ServiceCreatorCallback = delegate of IServiceContainer * Type -> obj

param.name: container
param.span: 请求创建服务的服务容器。

span.span: The service container that requested the creation of the service.
The type of service to create.

summary.span: 提供一种回调机制，它可以即需创建服务的实例。

span.span: Provides a callback mechanism that can create an instance of a service on demand.

returns.span: 由 指定的服务；如果未能创建服务，则为 。

span.span: The service specified by , or if the service could not be created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供了一种机制来发布已创建需要时，你可以请求的服务而不是立即在设计器加载时要创建的服务。 provides a mechanism to publish services that you can request to have created when needed, rather than the service being created immediately when the designer loads. 如果该服务不是必需的并且不能使用，可以使用回调函数。You can use a callback function if the service is not essential and may not be used. 通过使用发布的服务不使用尽可能多的其他资源，如果不请求，并创建。A service published by using a does not use as many additional resources if it is not requested and created. 若要使用的回调函数来发布服务，传递到方法的。To use a callback function to publish your service, pass a to the method of an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何发布服务使用的回调函数。The following code example shows how to publish a service using a callback function. [!code-cpp[Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
